item.title: Madam X - Stand Up And Fight
item.description:
작사: PETRUCCI MAXINE, DOLIBER CHRISTOPHER
KY: 61781 / KY: 20611

Ah Nothin’ get me
mad like this
I see it
all the time
And always try to
make your turn it down
Remember use an iron
fist you
Got to know
your rights
Don’t ever ever
let them put you down
Hard rocker
(stand up and
Fight for your
rock and roll rights)
Heart stopper
(stand up and
Fight for your
rock and roll rights)
Hard
rocker
We’ve been pushed
around for years
Do you have to
act like this
Always tryin’ to
make you look the fool
But it just
occurred to me
It’s time
to raise our fist
Here we go we’re
breakin’ all the rules
Hard rocker
(stand up and
Fight for your
rock and roll rights)
Heart stopper
(stand up and
Fight for your
rock and roll rights)
Hard rocker
no yeah

Oh oh
oh oh

Know you makes me
feel like this
I need it
all the time
Got to get it or
I’ll lose my mind
Seen all the
metal heads screamin’
In the night
turn on the lights
To see
what we will find
Hard rocker
(stand up and
Fight for your
rock and roll rights)
Heart stopper
(stand up and
Fight for your
rock and roll rights)
Hard rocker
(stand up and
Fight for your
rock and roll rights)
Heart stopper
